item.title: Learning Rust: My Journey
item.description:
I have recently started learning Rust, and it’s been an exciting journey.

Why Rust?

  • Memory safety without a garbage collector
  • High performance
  • Great for system programming and web assembly

I will be sharing tutorials, projects, and challenges I encounter while learning Rust. ðŸš€

item.title: Deploying My Hugo Site: A Step-by-Step Guide
item.description:
Hugo is a powerful static site generator that makes building websites incredibly fast and efficient. In this guide, I’ll walk you through how to create a complete Hugo site from scratch, including installation, configuration, and content creation.

ðŸš€ Getting Started with Hugo

Hugo makes it easy to build a lightning-fast website with minimal setup.

1. Install Hugo

First, you’ll need to install Hugo on your system:

# macOS (using Homebrew)
brew install hugo

# Windows (using Chocolatey)
choco install hugo -confirm

# Linux
snap install hugo

2. Create a New Site

Generate your new Hugo site with one command:
